name: test_online_consent_school_moves_with_existing_patient
description:
Test: Submit online flu consent for an existing child and
change schools.
Steps:
1. Fill in child and parent details and change schools.
2. Verify the school move is created in Mavis and confirm it.
3. Navigate to the session at the new school and go to consent tab.
4. Search for the child and verify the correct consent appears.
Verification:
- The consent method displayed in the session matches the expected method.
descriptionHtml:
Test: Submit online flu consent for an existing child and
change schools.
Steps:

  1. Fill in child and parent details and change schools.
  2. Verify the school move is created in Mavis and confirm it.
  3. Navigate to the session at the new school and go to consent tab.
  4. Search for the child and verify the correct consent appears.
    Verification:
  • The consent method displayed in the session matches the expected method.

testStage.description:
Test: Submit online flu consent for an existing child and
change schools.
Steps:
1. Fill in child and parent details and change schools.
2. Verify the school move is created in Mavis and confirm it.
3. Navigate to the session at the new school and go to consent tab.
4. Search for the child and verify the correct consent appears.
Verification:
- The consent method displayed in the session matches the expected method.

steps.name: Click No, they go to a different school
Click No, they go to a different school
Click on 'flu' session at School(name='Rhodes Wood Hospital School', urn='144726', site=None)
Select Consent given for nasal spray
Select Consent given for nasal spray
Select Consent given for injected vaccine
Select Consent given for injected vaccine
